verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Shall he that <S%H7378>contendeth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H3250>instruct<s%> him? he that <S%H3198>reproveth<s%> <S%H433>God,<s%> let him <S%H6030>answer<s%> it.
Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am <S%H7043>vile;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H7725>answer<s%> thee? I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3926>upon<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Once <S%H259><s%> have I <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> but I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answer:<s%> yea, <S%H8147>twice;<s%> but I will proceed no <S%H3254>further.<s%> <S%H3808><s%>
Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5591>whirlwind,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Gird <S%H247>up<s%> thy <S%H2504>loins<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> like a <S%H1397>man:<s%> I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of thee, and <S%H3045>declare<s%> thou unto me.
Wilt thou <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6565>disannul<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment?<s%> wilt thou <S%H7561>condemn<s%> me, <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest be <S%H6663>righteous?<s%>
Hast thou an <S%H2220>arm<s%> like <S%H410>God?<s%> or canst thou <S%H7481>thunder<s%> with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> like <S%H3644>him?<s%>
Deck <S%H5710><s%> thyself <S%H4994>now<s%> with <S%H1347>majesty<s%> and <S%H1363>excellency;<s%> and <S%H3847>array<s%> thyself with <S%H1935>glory<s%> and <S%H1926>beauty.<s%>
Cast <S%H6327>abroad<s%> the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of thy <S%H639>wrath:<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H1343>proud,<s%> and <S%H8213>abase<s%> him.
Look <S%H7200>on<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H1343>proud,<s%> and bring him <S%H3665>low;<s%> and tread <S%H1915>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> in their <S%H8478>place.<s%>
Hide <S%H2934><s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> and <S%H2280>bind<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> in <S%H2934>secret.<s%>
Then will <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3034>confess<s%> unto thee <S%H3588>that<s%> thine own right <S%H3225>hand<s%> can <S%H3467>save<s%> thee.
Behold <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H930>behemoth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; he <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H2682>grass<s%> as an <S%H1241>ox.<s%>
Lo <S%H2009><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%> is in his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and his <S%H202>force<s%> is in the <S%H8306>navel<s%> of his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
He <S%H2654>moveth<s%> his <S%H2180>tail<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H730>cedar:<s%> the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> of his <S%H6344>stones<s%> are wrapped <S%H8276>together.<s%>
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are as strong <S%H650>pieces<s%> of <S%H5154>brass;<s%> his <S%H1634>bones<s%> are like <S%H4300>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H410>God:<s%> he that <S%H6213>made<s%> him can make his <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H5066>approach<s%> unto him.
Surely <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> bring him <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H944>food,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7832>play.<s%>
He <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the shady <S%H6628>trees,<s%> in the <S%H5643>covert<s%> of the <S%H7070>reed,<s%> and <S%H1207>fens.<s%>
The shady <S%H6628>trees<s%> <S%H5526>cover<s%> him with their <S%H6752>shadow;<s%> the <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> compass him <S%H5437>about.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he drinketh <S%H6231>up<s%> a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and <S%H2648>hasteth<s%> <S%H3808>not:<s%> he <S%H982>trusteth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he can draw <S%H1518>up<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H3947>taketh<s%> it with his <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> his <S%H639>nose<s%> <S%H5344>pierceth<s%> through <S%H4170>snares.<s%>
